title: 437 of 2020)), after consultation with the Minister for Health, hereby order as
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Assisted Decision-Making (Capacity)
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Assisted Decision-Making (Capacity) 

Act 2015 (Commencement) Order 2023.
text_norm: 1 order may cited assisted decision-making (capacity) act 2015 (commencement) order 2023

title: 437 of 2020)), after consultation with the Minister for Health, hereby order as
heading: 2. The 26th day of April 2023 is appointed as the day on which the
text_raw:
2. The 26th day of April 2023 is appointed as the day on which the 
following provisions, insofar as they do not relate to an advance healthcare 
directive or a designated healthcare representative or both, of the Assisted 
Decision-Making (Capacity) Act 2015 (No. 64 of 2015) shall come into 
operation: 

(a) Part 1, insofar as it is not already in operation; 

(b) Part 2; 

(c) Part 3; 

(d) Part 4; 

(e) Part 5, other than subsections (8) and (9) of section 36, 
subsections (5) to (8) of section 44, section 46(4) and section 
52(d); 

(f) Part 6, other than section 57; 

(g) Part 7, other than section 61, section 62, section 70 and section 

75(5); 

(h) Part 9, insofar as it is not already in operation, other than section 

100 and section 101(d); 

(i) 

(j) 

Part 10; 

Part 11; 

(k) Part 12, other than section 144. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 28th April, 2023. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [192] 3 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

26 April, 2023. 

RODERIC O'GORMAN, 

Minister for Children, Equality, Disability, Integration and 
Youth. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [192]
